Though you cannot fail to execrate the bar- barity of the AbiponeS, in cutting off and flay- ing the heads of their enemieS, yet I think you will judge these ignorant savages worthy osa little excuse, on reflecting that they do it from the example of their ancestors, and that of very many nations throughout the world, which, whenever they have an opportunity of venting their rage upon their enemieS, seem to cast away all sense of humanity, and to think that the victors have a right to practise any outrage upon the vanquished.
